de.lessvoid.niftyinternal.math

Class Mat4

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lessvoid.niftyinternal.math.Mat4
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Mat4
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Holds a 4x4 float matrix.
    Author:
    foo, void256 - removed all of the base class methods and some of the vector/transformation operations to make the class usable as a self contained class.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
